subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis, a former Red Sox player, agreed to a one-year, $12-million deal with the Yankees to replace Alex Rodriguez at third base while he recovers from hip surgery.
snippet: Kevin Youkilis, a former Red Sox player, agreed to a one-year, $12-million deal with the Yankees to replace Alex Rodriguez at third base while he recovers from hip surgery.
